name: Petri (Zesty The Lemon)
description:
A small sandbox game with constant deep and complex interactions between different animals. observe them, interfere with them, or maybe just blow up the entire map if you're that type of guy...

CONTROLS:

WASD to move around

SCROLLWHEEL to scroll

MOUSE 0 to place objects

MOUSE 1 to anchor camera onto/off living entities

P to pause time

R to reset/reroll map

TAB to disable UI

ESC to exit to main menu
